local_intent: Perceive the T-block, align to it, set yaw 90 deg, push it 0.1 straight at 90 deg, and verify visibility.
assumptions: Block remains in view after push
Safe to approach directly for alignment
coherence_with_global: Matches the global plan segment: visibility with retry scan, align to t_block, set yaw=90, perform push with specified parameters, then verify.
